E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 5/1/1993
Subject: Progress of Danny Perreault
Dear Sir,
Danny Perreault is hitting the ball well at AA Bastien Deans!
He has an AVG of .316, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Subject: Progress of Kenneth Schoenberger
Dear Sir,

He has an ERA of 1.60 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director

Subject: Status of Brian Pino
Dear Sir,
Brian Pino isn't hitting the ball at all at AA Bastien Deans!

the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,

Date: Wednesday, 5/7/1993
Subject: Starting pitcher
Manager,
Believe it or not, but I am a starting pitcher!
Would you please treat me as one and put
me in the rotation?

Regards,
Lyndon Williamson



Date: Friday, 5/16/1993
Subject: Joe Darcy healing process
Joe Darcy is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 7 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor
